name: Roam
tagline: Simple data collection built using QGIS.
body:
Roam is a field data collection application built using the QGIS libraries and Python. It was built to be easy to use on (windows) based tablet devices, with Android planned for the future.

![](https://photos-2.dropbox.com/t/0/AADFM-a9APa22xsLz2tBhg7A9c8XEgt0g2nsbkgi2eT9ZA/12/6170988/png/1024x768/3/1390438800/0/2/select.png/DJxih-CTI-pY-i_ShkXAV4PX9yM_EuzEzcJ2BBXK4hE)

![](https://photos-2.dropbox.com/t/0/AACh19vvt4RcnLg9_rMIYaS0Ji4gLbqRqFS9TlqAhro0Rg/12/6170988/png/2048x1536/3/1390442400/0/2/dataentry.png/C-Hm5TPMTm7IZYvwx3dExodEn4llO-RUlqj47j05WfY)

See the [wiki](https://github.com/DMS-Aus/Roam/wiki) for information on how to create a project and user guides.
